    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentleft" style="width:230px;">
      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox10139332">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10139332">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10139332">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Getting Started with Reference Resources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content10139332">
          <p>
           The resources on this page can help you to
           <strong>
            brainstorm
           </strong>
           topic ideas,
           <strong>
            narrow
           </strong>
           your topic to make it more manageable, or learn
           <strong>
            background
           </strong>
           information about a topic you have picked.
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt10139332" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox10140146">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10140146">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10140146">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Encyclopedias, Handbooks, Literature Reviews, and More
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10140146">
          <p>
           To find more print and online reference books for general psychology, as well as specific subjects within or related to psychology, search Encompass Search or ask for help.
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt10140146" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12372525">
              <a id="link_12372525" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12372525,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Psychology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Background Information'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12327125}); ">
               Credo Reference
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Hundreds of dictionaries, encyclopedias, fact books, guides, companions and more from respected publishers across dozens of major subject areas, including many notable titles for psychology.  Full text is linked directly in the database.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12334746">
              <a id="link_12334746" href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/oclc/1435605?databaseList=1708,638" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12334746,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Psychology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Background Information'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12327113}); ">
               Annual Review of Psychology
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Literature reviews providing summary and analysis of research in the field of psychology, published annually.  Good for an overview of the state of research on a given topic.  Full text is available online for 1950-present.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23946563">
              <a id="link_23946563" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://link.springer.com/book/10.1007/978-3-540-29678-2" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23946563,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Psychology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Background Information'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23946563}); ">
               Encyclopedia of Neuroscience
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12372808">
              <b>
               Encyclopedia of Psychology
              </b>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Location: Main Collection (Ref.) 150.3 E563o vol. 1-8 (Level A)
               <br />
               In-depth entries on a wide variety of psychological topics.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12372846">
              <b>
               Handbook of Psychology
              </b>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Location: Main Collection (Ref.) 150 H236o vol. 1-12 (Level A)
               <br />
               In-depth entries on a wide variety of psychological topics.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox10140228">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10140228">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10140228">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           DSM
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10140228">
          <div id="boxatt10140228" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12334827">
              <b>
               DSM-IV-TR: Diagnostic and Statistical Manual of Mental Disorders
              </b>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Location: Ready Reference 616.89 A512d4 2000 (Level A)
               <br />
               Information about and criteria for the classification of mental disorders. (Published in 2000.)
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12334894">
              <b>
               DSM-IV Sourcebook
              </b>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Location: Main Collection (Ref.) 616.89075 A512d4, Suppl. vol. 1-4 (Level B)
               <br />
               Explains the rationale and evidence used to develop the criteria set forth in the DSM-IV.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20007082">
              <b>
               DSM-5: Diagnostic and Statistical Manual of Mental Disorders
              </b>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Location: Ready Reference 616.89 A512d5 (Level A)
               <br />
               Information about and criteria for the classification of mental disorders. (Published in 2013.)
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox10169155">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10169155">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10169155">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Resources for Newspapers and Magazines
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10169155">
          <div id="boxatt10169155" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12369806">
              <a id="link_12369806" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12369806,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Psychology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Background Information'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12335038}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database of both scholarly and popular publications in a wide variety of disciplines and subject areas, including psychology. Most full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise use the Get It links to find the library's other full text or physical copies.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12369807">
              <a id="link_12369807" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.lexisnexis.com/hottopics/lnacademic" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12369807,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Psychology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Background Information'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12369807}); ">
               LexisNexis Academic
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database of newspapers, magazines, broadcast transcripts, business publications, legal materials, and more.  Full text is linked directly in the database.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12369808">
              <a id="link_12369808" href="http://www.sciencedaily.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12369808,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Psychology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Background Information'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12369808}); ">
               ScienceDaily
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A web site devoted to science news covering "all fields of the physical, biological, earth and applied sciences. Stories are integrated with photographs and illustrations, links to journals and academic studies, related research and topics, encyclopedia articles, and videos."
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox10172685">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10172685">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10172685">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Websites
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10172685">
          <div id="boxatt10172685" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12373077">
              <a id="link_12373077" href="http://www.apa.org/topics/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12373077,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Psychology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Background Information'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12373077}); ">
               American Psychological Association
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Links to scholarly research, related news, and more, organized by psychological topic.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12373388">
              <a id="link_12373388" href="http://www.psychologicalscience.org/index.php/about/psychology-links#orgs" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12373388,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Psychology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Background Information'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12373388}); ">
               Association for Psychology Science: Psychology Links
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Links to U.S. and international psychological societies and related organizations, U.S. government agencies, and more.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12373151">
              <a id="link_12373151" href="http://www.nimh.nih.gov/index.shtml" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12373151,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Psychology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Background Information'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12373151}); ">
               National Institute of Mental Health
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Information on signs, symptoms, treatment, as well as statistics and more regarding mental health disorders and issues.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile2893499" class="profile_wrapper">
       <div class="roundbox outerbox">
        <div class="roundbox headerbox">
         <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
          <tr>
           <td>
            <h2>
             Get Help
            </h2>
           </td>
          </tr>
         </table>
        </div>
        <div class="roundbox innerboxprofile" style="padding:5px;">
         <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
          <tr>
           <td>
            <div class="profile_image_box" id="profile_image_box_63913">

             <div class="profile_display_name">
              Jen Jarson
             </div>
            </div>
